title: The Critic
creator_credit: Ernest Pintoff and Learning Corporation of America
brief_description: With voice-over commentary by Mel Brooks as an aging cinema patron, this animated film is a satire on audiences as well as on the offerings in present day theatres and art galleries. The film ridicules both ‘art’ that is really a hoax, and people who mistake ignorance for wit and wisdom.
